name: wood-hammer
effect: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
short_effect: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

flavor_text.x_y: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.
